title: Helping
alt: Oh, look, the 'make everything better' button was here behind the bookshelf all along.
transcript:
It turns out you can't take responsibility for someone else's happiness.
[Cueball looking at a curled-up Megan.][Cueball's hand on Megan's shoulder.][Megan has her head in her hands.][Cueball watching an ambulance take Megan away in a stretcher.]
